::DrillBit::

"You'll have your chance. First we'll see KitKat, then you can get a CR
tank." 
They reached the base. He walked to the meeting room and knocked.
"KitKat? You in there love?"

::Hot Rod::

"I understand. I will stay with you."
He gave her another light kiss.
"Omae o korosu," he said again.
"Thats Japanese for 'I love you'."
He took her hand.
"Come on. Lets get you patched up."
